values: 空气；大气；航空；通风；天空；气氛；气质；风度；神态；感觉；摆架子；样子；曲调；旋律
使通风；通风；透风；晾；晾干；风干；散发（气味或情感）；播出；传播；表达；公开；公开发表；展示；揭露；披露；放送（电视或广播节目）

synonym.mean: 空气，大气；天空；样子；曲调

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 空气的；通风的；幻想的；轻快的；空中的
不通风的；没有风的；缺少空气的

word_mean_info__list.difference: 普通用词，指对人或事情的看法和采取的行为，多有某种不很明确或不便明说的感情色彩。
多指某人在某一场合的言谈举止等。
含义广泛。单数形式指某人脸上表现出的心理活动，或言谈举止；复数形式指某人故意做作而摆出的架子。

word_group.brief_definition: 空调, 空调设备, 冷气机
空气污染；大气污染；环境空气污染
透气, 风干, 气曝, 充气；空运, 乘飞机；用无线电
清洁的空气；洁净空气；干净的空气
在空气中；随处可见的, 弥漫的；盛行的；悬而未决
飘飘欲仙的；洋洋得意的

bilingual.source: The air was very clear and fresh.

bilingual.target: 植物需要空气、水和阳光。

bilingual.source: We feel good in the fresh air.
bilingual.target: 我们在新鲜空气中感觉很好。

list.abstract: AIR（英 [eə]，美 [er]），英语单词。作名词时，意为空气、神气、航空。作及物动词时，意为公开表达，使…通风，播送，晾干。短语搭配：AIR quality（空气质量）。例句：Traffic has become synonymous with air pollution.（交通已经成为空气污染的近义词。） AIR作名词时的近义词有atmosphere、heaven、sky。其作及物动词时的近义词有ventilate、sport。
AIR耐克的一个科技系列产品，最主要的是 Air Max360 系列，无阻隔全掌气垫是AirMax360的最大卖点，鞋面雷射刻印大有进步，一块过面料及减去泡棉中底减轻很多重量，但气垫变黄是难以避免的 ；AIR(气垫) - 分为内置式、可见式。

yingyinNormal.en: I enjoy the fresh air. Don't enjoy it too much.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我喜欢新鲜空气。别太享受了。

yingyinNormal.en: It's got a bit of air in it, which I'm going to smash out now.
yingyinNormal.zh: 现在有了一些空气，我要把空气挤出去。

yingyinNormal.en: Reggie, you'll take the car to and from school. I like the air, okay? I like to breathe in the air.
yingyinNormal.zh: 雷吉，你必须坐车上下学。我喜欢外面的空气，我喜欢呼吸外面的空气。

yingyinNormal.en: By the time the ship's going fast enough for air resistance to matter, it'll be high enough that there's practically no air.
yingyinNormal.zh: 等到飞船的速度快到会受空气阻力影响的时候，就应该已经到达没有多少空气的高度了。

yingyinNormal.en: And the park for one hour every other Sunday for fresh air.
yingyinNormal.zh: 隔周周日送我去公园呼吸新鲜空气。

yingyinNormal.en: But they throw an actual ball. You were throwing air at a TV.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但人家投的是真球，你是往电视投空气。

yingyinNormal.en: There is strange magic in the air, and dangerous beasts are afoot.
yingyinNormal.zh: 空气中弥漫着奇异魔法，危险的野兽四处游荡。
yingyinNormal.videoNameEn: 《Night at the Museum: Secret of the Tomb》

yingyinNormal.en: And you thought a drive would be good for me. A breath of fresh air.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你觉得出去兜风会对我有好处，呼吸新鲜空气。

yingyinNormal.en: What? Come on, it's your turn. We said we'd get more fresh air.
yingyinNormal.zh: 什么？快点，该你了，我们说好要呼吸新鲜空气的。

yingyinNormal.en: Yeah, but it will also blow the nose off the ship. And all the air will leave, and we need air to not die.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但是会把飞船顶部的密闭舱给炸掉。然后所有的空气就都跑了，然后我们不想死。

yingyinNormal.en: Knocking back the bread, forces the air out of it and deflates the balloon.
yingyinNormal.zh: 敲打面团，把空气挤出去，把面里的气泡挤扁。

yingyinNormal.en: Seriously, the pathogen is expelled as fecal matter or poop particles in the air.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这种病原体以排泄物微粒的形式散播到空气中。

yingyinNormal.en: The air is blue,and keen and cold, and in a frozen sheath enrolled.
yingyinNormal.zh: 空气里弥漫着阴郁寒冷直透骨髓雪凝结成冰，包裹了万物。

yingyinNormal.en: Folks, l hold in my hand a device so powerful, it can actually pull air right out of the sky.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我手上拿的强力装置可以从空中萃取空气!

yingyinNormal.en: Ross, I am not gonna run away again. I just want to get a little fresh air. Okay. Okay.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我不会再逃走，我只想呼吸点新鲜空气。好吧。好吧。

yingyinNormal.en: Blight does. And as it thrives, our air gets less and less oxygen.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但枯萎病菌呼吸氮气，所以当它越来越猖獗，空气里的氧气就会越来越少。

yingyinNormal.en: We can no longer afford to consider air and water common property free to be abused by anyone.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们不得不考虑空气和水源，这些公共财产正被破坏。

yingyinNormal.en: I know. The air, the trees. Even though Nana's gone, there's something almost, I don't know, almost life...
yingyinNormal.zh: 我知道空气，树木，即使外婆已过世, 就好像…

yingyinNormal.en: It restricted emissions released into the air by big polluters like coal-fired power plants.
yingyinNormal.zh: 它限制排放量，释放到空气中，如污染大户-燃煤发电厂。

yingyinNormal.en: I'd rather vent my rage on the desert air and return when I've regained control of my tongue.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我还是对着沙漠空气发泄吧…等我能管好自己的嘴，再回来。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 神情; 神气; 氛围

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 宽敞明亮又通风的；轻率的；轻浮的；不真诚的

word_family.mean: n. 大气；空气；神情；神气；曲调；小调；空中；航空；空运

examination_example.sentence: Which is considered a weakness of the city-level measures to tackle dirty <highlight>air</highlight>?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 哪一项被认为是城市一级解决空气污染措施的弱点？

examination_example.sentence: It was specifically to provide city dwellers with spaces for leisure where they could experience "a refreshing <highlight>air</highlight>."
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它是专门为城市居民提供休闲空间，让他们可以体验“清新的空气”。

examination_example.sentence: Said one recorder of events, "The <highlight>air</highlight> at twelve leagues' distance smelt as sweet as a new-blown garden."
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一位记录事件的人说:“十二里格外的空气闻起来就象新开的花园一样芬芳。”

sense_info_list.en: broadcast something or be broadcast on radio or television

examination_example.sentence: But demanding too much of <highlight>air</highlight> travelers or providing too little security in return undermines public support for the process.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但对航空旅客要求过高或提供的安全保障太少，会削弱公众对这一过程的支持。

sense_info_list.en: make opinions or complaints known to other people
an impression of a quality or manner given by someone or something
sense_info_list.zh: 神情; 神气; 氛围

sense_info_list.en: (light air) a breeze or light wind
the space above the earth where planes fly

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 憋闷的；不通风的；无风的；一动不动的

word_family.mean: n. 大气；空气；神情；神气；曲调；小调；空中；航空；空运

examination_example.sentence: The chemicals on shoes can deteriorate <highlight>air</highlight> quality.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 鞋子上的化学物质会恶化空气质量。

examination_example.sentence: The dust and toxic chemicals you bring into your house via your shoes can deteriorate the <highlight>air</highlight> quality in your home.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你通过鞋子把灰尘和有毒化学物质带进你的房子，会恶化你家里的空气质量。

examination_example.sentence: Marconi was the first to develop and perfect this system, using the recently-discovered "<highlight>air</highlight> waves" that make up the electromagnetic spectrum.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Marconi是第一个开发和完善这个系统的人，他利用了最近发现的构成电磁波谱的“空气波”。

examination_example.sentence: The islanders have built elaborate resorts and improved the beaches and have expanded sea and <highlight>air</highlight> routes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 岛民们建造了精致的度假村，改善了海滩，并扩大了海上和空中航线。

examination_example.sentence: All these concepts are massively expensive, require safety certification standards for road and <highlight>air</highlight>, and need dual controls.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 所有这些观念都非常昂贵，并且需要道路和空中的安全认证标准和双重控制。

examination_example.sentence: They can <highlight>air</highlight> their views.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们可以发表意见。

word_usage.usage:
表示“乘飞机” 可以用by air。注意by air是介词短语，不可用作谓语。
示例：他乘飞机来到太原。
误 He by air to Taiyuan.
正 He came to Taiyuan by air.

air表示“空气”时，为不可数名词，其前不用冠词。但指“天空/空中”时，须加定冠词(the air)。
示例：Let's go out for some fresh air.
我们出去呼吸点新鲜空气。

短语“put on airs (with sb)”表示“(对某人)摆架子/装腔作势”，这里是固定用法，s不能省略，示例：
Don't put on airs with me!
别对我摆架子！

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 含义广泛。单数形式指某人脸上表现出的心理活动, 或言谈举止; 复数形式指某人故意做作而摆出的架子。
普通用词, 指对人或事情的看法和采取的行为, 多有某种不很明确或不便明说的感情色彩。
多指某人在某一场合的言谈举止等。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 空气污染；大气污染；环境空气污染
透气；风干；气曝；充气；空运；乘飞机；用无线电

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: It has experienced an overall decline in <highlight>air</highlight> quality.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它经历了空气质量的全面下降。

examination_example.sentence: Nowadays forests are increasingly welcome because they suck in carbon pollution from the <highlight>air</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如今，森林越来越受欢迎，因为它们吸收了空气中的碳污染。

examination_example.sentence: Their capability of improving <highlight>air</highlight> quality.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们改善空气质量的能力。

examination_example.sentence: If you're planning on being one of them soon, you might not be looking forward to the unpleasant feeling <highlight>air</highlight> travel often leaves you with.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果你近期打算成为他们中的一员，你可能不会期待飞机旅行给你留下的不适感。

examination_example.sentence: One vision of the perfect city of the future is a place that offers easy access to <highlight>air</highlight> travel.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 人们对“未来的完美城市”有这样一种设想：一个提供便捷的航空旅行的地方。

examination_example.sentence: Perception of sweet and salty foods dropped by almost 30 percent in a simulation of <highlight>air</highlight> travel.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在模拟航空旅行的过程中，人们对甜食和咸味食品的感知度下降了近30%。

examination_example.sentence: The 21st century will increasingly be an aviation century, as the globe becomes increasingly connected by <highlight>air</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 21世纪会日益成为空运世纪，因为全球之间的航空联系越来越紧密。

examination_example.sentence: Therefore, these new findings should help airplane passengers to feel less vulnerable to catching respiratory infections while traveling by <highlight>air</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 因此，这些新的发现应该有助于减轻乘客对搭机旅行过程中易患呼吸道感染的忧虑。

sense_info_list.en: the space above the earth where planes fly

examination_example.sentence: "People are cheering and holding their carts in the <highlight>air</highlight>," says Giovanni Giorgio, who helped organize the march with a grass-roots organization called Generazione.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Giovanni Giorgio 说：“人们欢呼雀跃，将手推车举向空中。”他与一个名为 Generazione 的基层组织一起组织了游行。

word_usage.usage:
air表示“空气”时，为不可数名词，其前不用冠词。但指“天空/空中”时，须加定冠词(the air)。
示例：Let's go out for some fresh air.
我们出去呼吸点新鲜空气。

表示“乘飞机” 可以用by air。注意by air是介词短语，不可用作谓语。
示例：他乘飞机来到太原。
误 He by air to Taiyuan.
正 He came to Taiyuan by air.

短语“put on airs (with sb)”表示“(对某人)摆架子/装腔作势”，这里是固定用法，s不能省略，示例：
Don't put on airs with me!
别对我摆架子！

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 空气调节系统；空调设备;用空气调节设备调节空气

examination_example.sentence: Fresh <highlight>air</highlight> cleans our lungs.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 新鲜空气可以净化我们的肺。

examination_example.sentence: Is fresh <highlight>air</highlight> really good for you?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 新鲜空气真的对你有好处吗？

examination_example.sentence: The <highlight>air</highlight> was so different from the city, cool and fresh.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这里的空气与城市截然不同，凉爽清新。

exam_freq_info.chinese: (walk on air)飘飘然; 洋洋得意

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 空气污染；大气污染；环境空气污染
透气；风干；气曝；充气；空运；乘飞机；用无线电
清洁的空气；洁净空气；干净的空气
在空气中；随处可见的；弥漫的；盛行的；悬而未决
飘飘欲仙的；洋洋得意的

sense_info_list.en: the mixture of gases that surrounds the earth and that we breathe

examination_example.sentence: So turn off the <highlight>air</highlight> conditioner (空调) when you don't need to use it.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 所以当你不需要空调的时候关掉它。

examination_example.sentence: Climate change will cause <highlight>air</highlight> pollution and diseases.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 气候变化会导致空气污染和疾病。

examination_example.sentence: Our drinking water is becoming dirtier, and the <highlight>air</highlight> is not as clean as before.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们的饮用水越来越脏，空气也不像以前那么干净了。

sense_info_list.en: the space above the ground or that is around things

examination_example.sentence: We will give an open-<highlight>air</highlight> concert in our town.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们将在我们镇举行一场露天音乐会。

examination_example.sentence: For example, you can draw the shape of the Eiffel Tower in the <highlight>air</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 例如，你可以在空中画出埃菲尔铁塔的形状。

examination_example.sentence: If the temperature is below 0oC, water will turn into ice in the open <highlight>air</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果温度低于0摄氏度，水在户外会变成冰。

sense_info_list.en: the space above the earth where planes fly

examination_example.sentence: An <highlight>air</highlight> hostess came by and explained the situation.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一名空姐经过并解释了情况。

examination_example.sentence: What was the <highlight>air</highlight> hostesses' problem?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 空姐的问题是什么？

examination_example.sentence: "Clara was amazing," an <highlight>air</highlight> hostess told Alaska Airlines in an interview.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一位空姐在接受阿拉斯加航空采访时表示:“克拉拉太棒了。

sense_info_list.zh: (walk on air)飘飘然; 洋洋得意

examination_example.sentence: I was walking on <highlight>air</highlight> as John and I crossed the playground.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当我和约翰穿过操场时，我高兴得飘飘然。

word_usage.usage:
表示“乘飞机” 可以用by air。注意by air是介词短语，不可用作谓语。
示例：他乘飞机来到太原。
误 He by air to Taiyuan.
正 He came to Taiyuan by air.

air表示“空气”时，为不可数名词，其前不用冠词。但指“天空/空中”时，须加定冠词(the air)。
示例：Let's go out for some fresh air.
我们出去呼吸点新鲜空气。

短语“put on airs (with sb)”表示“(对某人)摆架子/装腔作势”，这里是固定用法，s不能省略，示例：
Don't put on airs with me!
别对我摆架子！
